Web Design | Web Development

I have built different layouts for different businesses, always trying to keep it simple while maintaining a high visual appeal, the idea is always to achieve and mix a pleasant User Interface and User Experience. Technique wise, I have worked building Websites and Web Applications with pure HTML, CSS, JS and PHP, and also with CMS'(Content Management System) and Frameworks such as Wordpress, Angular

As a Full Stack Developer for Digital Salon, I was able to specialize and create Websites for a niche target (Hair, Beauty and SPA salons), having to integrate e-commerce and online booking systems to them while making sure they had a high visual appeal. I had used many different techniques in this job, mainly integrating Wordpress with WooCommerce and having worked with Premium and Custom themes. I am also responsible for the back end configuration and maintenance of the server (Digital Ocean) where we host around 200 websites.

I also enjoy experimenting and imagining other types of Websites and Businessess to create templates myself. You can see some samples below for other clients that I had worked for in the past and also some of my own projects.

Mobile App Development

The Mobile App area has always interested me due to the moment we're living in. The initial obvious choice was picking up technologies that derived from the Web Development world. For that, I had studied more of JavaScript and experimented with the Angular and Ionic frameworks. Although these were the technologies I picked, I never limit myself to specific ones, so having had this experience in the trending world of Progressive Web Apps, I am also studying how native app development works and its perks. You can see below some of the mobile apps I had developed with the Ionic Framework alongside Firebase or Laravel as a back end. Many native features and API integrations such as Google Maps, Camera, GeoLocation, Push Notifications, Instant Messaging (Chat) have also been utilized in these projects.

How Do I Work?

I have worked building Websites and Web Applications with pure HTML, CSS, JS and PHP, and also with CMS'(Content Management System) and Frameworks such as Wordpress, WooCommerce, Angular, Ionic, Laravel. I have also touched many other technologies and platforms such as Joomla and Magento, SquareSpace and Wix, and the list goes on. I am first and foremost a Developer that tries to understand that different techologies and techniques may fit different projects and solutions, so I am always opened to new ideas and work environments. I did, however, mentioned the technologies I am more familiar in the paragraph above, so you can count that it would probably take me less time for me to find a solution using one of those :)
